channel.title: [PI]Making Overloads so they don't damage you when you drink them
channel.description:
Files edited: Potions.java (src\server\models\players) Difficulty: 0/10; this is possible the easiest thing in the world.
Open up Potions.java. Search for this code: [code]public void doOverload(int itemId, int replaceItem, int slot) {[/code]
somewhere under there should be this: [code] c.overloadcounter = 5;[/code]
Replace that with this: [code] c.overloadcounter = 0;[/code]
Thats it for now.

item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

For the people who actually add overloads to there game, i’m pretty sure they wouldn’t want it to seem less like runescape, when they had added overloads to make it seem more like it. I’m guessing this could help some people, but not the general population of teh mopes
